abstract: Homeland Security Sec Jeh Johnson issues warning about shoppers visiting Mall of America outside Minneapolis after Somalian extremist group Shabab makes threats against mall, as well as other major shopping areas, in video posted online.
lead_paragraph: Jeh C. Johnson urged shoppers to be “particularly careful” in visiting the mall after it was targeted for a terrorist attack in a video posted by the Shabab.

headline.main: Shoppers Cautioned After Threat Against Mall of America
headline.print_headline: Shoppers Cautioned After Threat Against Mall

snippet: Jeh C. Johnson urged shoppers to be “particularly careful” in visiting the mall after it was targeted for a terrorist attack in a video posted by the Shabab.
